content: this text summarizes a legal dispute between two parties referred to as messrs f c f and mr f p the dispute revolves around the division of a property worth 260000 euros the parties decided to engage in a mediation process on april 15 2014 in an attempt to find a resolution they had multiple meetings and discussions and on july 21 2014 they successfully reached an agreement according to the agreement mr p f will receive a commercial premises while the brothers c f will receive other assets both parties are satisfied with the division and plan to formalize the agreement with a notary public as a result the mediation process is considered closed and the total cost incurred for the mediation is 1'118.34 euros

metadata.cost: 1118.34 EUR legal cost 201'118.34 EUR compensation cost
